title: PING ISSUES!
body: So i dont get why when i start out the first 10 minutes with awesome great ping. Then afterwards it starts spiking out of the blue. Where are the riot servers located so i can do speedtests?

replies.body: You can run a traceroute to our server at **104.160.131.1** using the network app [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). I'd recommend letting it run for *5 minutes* before exporting your results as text and dropping them here in a reply.
